response_text: <rss xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" version="2.0"><channel><atom:link href="http://feed.cnet.com/feed/collection" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" /><title>CNET iPhone Update</title><description>Tips, news, how tos, and troubleshooting help for the iPhone.</description><image><url>http://i.i.cbsi.com/cnwk.1d/i/ne/gr/prtnr/CNET_Logo_150.gif</url><title>CNET iPhone Update</title><link><![CDATA[ http://www.cnet.com/#ftag=CAD4aa2096 ]]></link></image><link><![CDATA[ http://www.cnet.com/#ftag=CAD4aa2096 ]]></link><item><title>FBI expects more legal actions over encrypted devices - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/fbi-expects-more-legal-squabbles-over-encrypted-devices/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">a7485ded-db0d-4df2-88e3-6c219ef6ddaf</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 16:28:06 +0000</pubDate><description>The bureau will continue to fight to access encrypted phones as part of its war on terrorism, says FBI Director James Comey.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/02/17/06102914-8d32-41f0-989e-1441fe852e98/thumbnail/300x230/eef39e55702055649206cd0ef156dbe8/apple-security-keys-fbi-2158.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>3 reasons you should install Opera VPN for iOS right now - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/3-reasons-you-should-install-opera-vpn-for-ios-right-now/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">6fb5ad65-5cea-44ee-8d79-d8ebf3112b80</guid><pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 20:10:18 +0000</pubDate><description>Also, one setting in the browser that you might want to turn off.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/527fd3be-0864-43c6-b5fd-3355edd4a6d0/thumbnail/300x230/c5aeb1da915722c56ffd35b3e3c8a823/opera-vpn-icon.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>iPhone app can alert you if your device gets hacked - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/iphone-app-can-alert-you-if-your-phone-has-been-hacked/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">e379b200-c0ea-4f4e-9b69-8a7216c68c1c</guid><pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 15:07:44 +0000</pubDate><description>A new app dubbed System and Security Info will scope out your iPhone for potential security threats.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/02339dd9-6ab8-4330-8bea-82f6efcc4bfb/thumbnail/300x230/94697bcdabbe34e291e2e0ac5f3a3016/system-security-info-app.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>India claims to have tool to defeat iPhone encryption - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/india-claims-to-have-tool-to-defeat-iphone-encryption/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">3299f7d1-ab19-4f98-8447-7ccfd61bf02c</guid><pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 16:19:24 +0000</pubDate><description>The country's communications and IT minister says the government has a forensics tool that can handle smartphones, including Apple's.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/02/17/f8305eb9-f665-48dc-bfb2-f4428eba4ec8/thumbnail/300x230/879b76c039f541b980455f2ff1639d60/apple-security-keys-fbi-2151.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple's request to sell used iPhones in India gets denied - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apples-request-to-sell-used-iphones-in-india-gets-denied/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">adb850da-51ad-429b-a300-ba94289dd651</guid><pubDate>Tue, 03 May 2016 17:52:08 +0000</pubDate><description>The denial by the Indian government hampers Apple's goal of selling budget-friendly iPhones in the world's second-biggest smartphone market.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/09/25/ba541ad8-2603-4252-b9b3-92456ca9d8f7/thumbnail/300x230/a83a8ee9ba3b1983b75cdb4e1bcebbdd/iphone-6s-01.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>5 ways to seriously cut back on iPhone data usage - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/5-tips-to-reduce-iphone-data-usage/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">17b63532-1b55-4cb7-85bb-7411e5355595</guid><pubDate>Mon, 02 May 2016 22:51:11 +0000</pubDate><description>Take control of how your iPhone uses its cellular data connection.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/09/22/9c905bec-0cbf-47ce-aa38-e710158a377c/thumbnail/300x230/5f4a0124731d3196151b4b5c5f810454/ios-9-how-to-new-features-7.jpg"/><dc:creator>Matt Elliott</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple retail stores could soon land in India - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-retail-stores-could-soon-land-in-india/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">890136e5-f835-4589-9320-0821c0431107</guid><pubDate>Thu, 28 Apr 2016 15:13:19 +0000</pubDate><description>The Indian government may exempt Apple from a policy that would otherwise prevent it from launching its own stores, says the Times of India.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2009/11/12/f271b80b-f0fd-11e2-8c7c-d4ae52e62bcc/thumbnail/300x230/2f1154711e4ce727010f841dee745432/02applestore_upperwest_CNET_1.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>iPhone SE demand outstripping supply, says Apple - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/iphone-se-demand-outstripping-supply-says-apple/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">3957d1e0-b87b-4c3c-af27-417f7c8506fa</guid><pubDate>Wed, 27 Apr 2016 14:49:35 +0000</pubDate><description>But CEO Tim Cook says the company is hustling to catch up on production of the diminutive new phone.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/21/60493701-9484-46b5-bc59-b7a20ae33f1e/thumbnail/300x230/43803ec47e0f85c1c92336b106fd96ce/fliphonese.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>iPhone Upgrade Program launches at online Apple Store - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/iphone-upgrade-program-launches-at-online-apple-store/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">3f3236cd-ca2d-40f2-a76d-6a1051a7e039</guid><pubDate>Tue, 26 Apr 2016 15:03:00 +0000</pubDate><description>The program that lets you upgrade your iPhone every year had been available only through Apple's retail outlets.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/09/11/1f52a1a1-6740-4ccb-8f41-3c677d9e002e/thumbnail/300x230/2c760adda8fb8a1ea3f9be00a98a5118/screen-shot-2015-09-09-at-3-03-40-pm.png"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>9 settings every new iPhone owner should change - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/9-settings-you-should-change-on-your-new-iphone/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">51ce1a3e-cff1-4703-ac79-88be56124acc</guid><pubDate>Tue, 03 May 2016 19:04:59 +0000</pubDate><description>Whether you're a newcomer to iOS or just upgrading to a newer model, consider tweaking these settings to improve performance and battery life.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/04/18/fa2b5a53-f02e-4a48-86a7-0f2709b17d14/thumbnail/300x230/158c0d9a8bfc13ac81bd2bf514d9971f/ios-brightness-slider.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>2017 iPhone will replace aluminum body with glass, says analyst - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/2017-iphone-glass-body-aluminum-ming-chi-kuo-samsung/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">926169d8-dcac-45d3-a00e-d846a994e7b0</guid><pubDate>Mon, 18 Apr 2016 16:06:29 +0000</pubDate><description>If true, the goal would be to make the iPhone more distinctive from smartphones that use metal bodies.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/09/09/c311a2da-e4c3-4d27-9956-7931b9bc2235/thumbnail/300x230/f757c1a5b610753462620e73ba7bfeb1/medium-carousel-apple-iphone-6-plus-7-new-isight-camera-770.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple iPhone SE owners bemoan audio bug - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-iphone-se-owners-complain-of-phone-call-audio-bug/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">276631fe-86fb-4c0f-a243-2a6dcd448a30</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Apr 2016 14:57:08 +0000</pubDate><description>Introduced with the latest update to iOS, the glitch distorts the quality of phone calls made via Bluetooth, according to some owners.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/24/a460e66d-795c-43a8-bb77-1f9b8e88ae22/thumbnail/300x230/955712207de488481c2ad1a13e7ce38c/iphone-se-30.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>FBI hasn't learned anything from unlocked San Bernardino iPhone, says report - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/fbi-apple-san-bernardino-iphone-terrorist-encryption-privacy/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">e8796734-b97c-4786-aa5b-5e23dd27fe64</guid><pubDate>Thu, 14 Apr 2016 15:37:40 +0000</pubDate><description>But the review of data on the phone used by a terrorist involved in the December shootings continues, according to CBS News.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/02/17/06102914-8d32-41f0-989e-1441fe852e98/thumbnail/300x230/eef39e55702055649206cd0ef156dbe8/apple-security-keys-fbi-2158.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Use Facebook Messenger to send and receive money - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/use-facebook-messenger-to-send-and-receive-money/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">ec416b9a-05c0-46bb-942f-79cd6eb77b10</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Apr 2016 21:52:48 +0000</pubDate><description>It's a little-known fact that Facebook's chat app can also make like PayPal. Here's how to set it up.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2014/11/10/7cea0f1d-d18f-41c4-9cd7-4347c949624f/thumbnail/300x230/344bf53240a94bbf0e385be2673ecff0/messenger.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>iPhone SE suddenly harder to find - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/iphone-se-hit-by-limited-availability/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">4ccfca55-f499-4d81-8c1c-43c599f4ff33</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Apr 2016 18:22:06 +0000</pubDate><description>A check of Apple US retail stores by AppleInsider reveals that just about every model of the new phone is unavailable for in-store pickup, while online ordering will force you wait at least two weeks for delivery.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/21/60493701-9484-46b5-bc59-b7a20ae33f1e/thumbnail/300x230/43803ec47e0f85c1c92336b106fd96ce/fliphonese.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>FBI says its iPhone-cracking tool works only on the 5C - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/fbi-says-third-party-unlock-scheme-works-only-on-iphone-5c/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">f6a0aa3f-e7cb-4545-87ef-8367a20c8638</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Apr 2016 14:57:46 +0000</pubDate><description>A third-party tool unlocked the iPhone 5C tied to one of the San Bernardino terrorists, but its skills apparently end there.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2013/09/12/accbf3b2-84b8-11e3-beb9-14feb5ca9861/thumbnail/300x230/bad858674b0189e2e6fbc729c9c41660/Cronus01.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>FBI stays mum on whether data on terrorist's iPhone is useful - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/fbi-mum-on-whether-data-on-terrorists-unlocked-iphone-is-useful/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">eb201050-1397-49eb-b7a3-47a95f0b4d01</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Apr 2016 15:28:12 +0000</pubDate><description>The feds waged a hard battle to access the contents of an iPhone tied to the San Bernardino shootings. They're not yet saying if they've found anything helpful.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/02/17/06102914-8d32-41f0-989e-1441fe852e98/thumbnail/300x230/eef39e55702055649206cd0ef156dbe8/apple-security-keys-fbi-2158.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple squashes Siri bug that allowed access to your photos and contacts - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-squashes-siri-bug-that-allowed-access-to-your-photos-and-contacts/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">d5bc575a-4f65-437f-ad9c-9f9bf7b73aed</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Apr 2016 14:39:38 +0000</pubDate><description>The flaw, now fixed on Apple's end, had meant miscreants could use Siri to bypass your phone's lock screen.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/04/05/3d2f0ba4-facb-4a32-bbd6-1db1fc493de9/thumbnail/300x230/30ffc8e06823b5c920df9b5a6ccd6872/ios9-bug.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>How to survive an iPhone with only 16GB of storage - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-survive-an-iphone-with-only-16gb-of-storage/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">6b067d47-a3a5-4849-823c-fd6ce43eb51d</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Apr 2016 23:43:28 +0000</pubDate><description>Whether you couldn't afford a pricier model or just misjudged how much storage you'd need, these tips can help you get by.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/04/04/70bc00a0-eb82-4bfe-8b79-cc5db6c53450/thumbnail/300x230/fc2344ab2c6a4e28139336f27481d3b7/leef-iaccess.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>iPhone SE fails to catch on during opening weekend - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-iphone-se-opening-weekend-activity/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">b1f6e42d-1434-432c-99e3-d6c8443f566f</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Apr 2016 14:07:24 +0000</pubDate><description>Apple's new 4-inch phone hits the market at at snail's pace compared with the iPhone 5S and the various iPhone 6 and 6S models.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/21/60493701-9484-46b5-bc59-b7a20ae33f1e/thumbnail/300x230/43803ec47e0f85c1c92336b106fd96ce/fliphonese.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Lego Jurassic World comes to Android, iOS - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/lego-jurassic-world-comes-to-android-ios/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">457c0044-a1cd-4d3c-82e9-b08fe821f1ce</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 17:36:48 +0000</pubDate><description>Way, way better than sitting through the movie. Cheaper, too.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/31/482ee698-693e-4dee-9e74-efb7be9e5ac9/thumbnail/300x230/fc46fd8cb1f99ec9b3c2ebf9f51217f9/jurassic-world-ios.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>This weird trick can free up gigabytes of space on your iPhone - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/how-to/out-of-space-on-your-iphone-try-this-magic-trick-to-free-up-more/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">46e00a94-11b4-4490-8f45-86ce0a2970e3</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Mar 2016 17:28:23 +0000</pubDate><description>Whoa! This unusual (and risk-free) hack can free up hundreds of megabytes, or maybe even a couple gigabytes.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/09/28/07b107fc-38e6-4231-9973-18048f729c31/thumbnail/300x230/1f9c2955fd6e879d68a6905cbfc41933/fd-apple-scores-better-on-bendability-tests-with-iphone-6s-and-6s-plus.jpg"/><dc:creator>Rick Broida</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple could learn how the feds unlocked an iPhone - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-could-learn-how-the-feds-unlocked-an-iphone/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">eb9a0f59-2ce3-4956-b57a-0f740370e19e</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Mar 2016 22:06:58 +0000</pubDate><description>A case in Brooklyn may determine if the FBI has to disclose how it unlocked the iPhone tied to the San Bernardino terror attack.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/02/17/06102914-8d32-41f0-989e-1441fe852e98/thumbnail/300x230/eef39e55702055649206cd0ef156dbe8/apple-security-keys-fbi-2158.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Apple pushes yet another version of iOS 9.3 to fix activation bug - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/apple-pushes-out-new-version-of-ios-9-3-to-fix-activation-bug/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">ccdb1809-25ab-410a-88f0-a6d0079f11e6</guid><pubDate>Tue, 29 Mar 2016 16:51:46 +0000</pubDate><description>The latest update fixes a bug that affects older iPhones and iPads. But wait, there's more! Apple still has to resolve a separate issue that could cause your device to crash.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/03/21/b872d034-eebc-4608-8706-ee9498b153df/thumbnail/300x230/306c5f47c36425bc7b6fedba7363d8fe/16n0321ios93still.jpg"/><dc:creator>Lance Whitney</dc:creator></item><item><title>Why the cheapest iPhone ever is still a bad deal - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/iphone-16gb-storage-screw-up/#ftag=CAD4aa2096</link><guid isPermaLink="false">eafabf05-3099-4a7d-a291-4f60c0bf2aaa</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Apr 2016 17:16:17 +0000</pubDate><description>Commentary: The iPhone SE is the most affordable Apple phone to date. But that's before you pay the extra $100 for the version with four times the storage.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2015/07/10/17f56e64-508c-4330-a47d-f57a0166ab33/thumbnail/300x230/cc24de37c20b26602f7f0456e9dbfda2/storage-almost-full-15.jpg"/><dc:creator>David Carnoy</dc:creator></item></channel></rss>
